data.title: DC United vs Mazatlan Prediction Saturday 10 August 2024, League Cup
data.meta_description: PREDICTION DC UNITED VS MAZATLAN on Saturday 10 August 2024, League Cup kick-off at 06:30 WIB at Audi Field Stadium
data.meta_site_name: NOBARTV.CO.ID - Kabar Berita & Komunitas Fans Bola
data.text:
NOBARTV NEWS DC United vs FC Mazatlan is an interesting match between DC United vs Mazatlan which will be presented in the 2024 League Cup or Leagues Cup play off round. This match will be held on Saturday 10 August 2024, the two teams will clash at 06:30 WIB at the Stadium Audi Field.

DC United has a less consistent performance, even though in the last two matches they managed to win. It is known that in their last five matches, DC United could only get three wins and suffered two defeats.

DC United managed to qualify for the play-off round after beating Santos Laguna with a landslide score of 3-0, this victory made DC United the group winners and qualified for the next round.

Meanwhile, Mazatlan, who comes from Liga MX, will have a tough match against DC United. Considering that DC United has several star players who have shined in Europe, these players are named Tielemans and Benteke.

Mzatlan's back line must be aware of the movements of these two players. Tielemans, who can fill DC United's midfield or wing line, will be tasked with supplying good balls to Benteke.

With this, we can be sure that the match will be quite exciting and fierce, both teams will try to win each other in order to advance to the next round. However, DC United is slightly favored because they are playing at home and it is known that DC United is superior in terms of team composition.

Before watching the match between DC United and Mazatlan on Nobartv link live streaming, check score predictions, line up, H2H, up to the following team statistics first.

Line Up Prediction

DC United

Formation: 4-2-3-1

Goalkeeper: Tyler Miller

Defenders: Andy Najar, Steven Birnbaum, Brendan Hines-Ike, Donovan Pines

Midfielders: Russell Canouse, Victor Palsson

Forwards: Christian Benteke, Taxi Fountas, Derrick Jones

Striker: Mateusz Klich

Mazatlan

Formation: 4-2-3-1

Goalkeeper: Nicolas Vikonis

Defenders: Nestor Vidrio, Eduardo Cardona, Brian Rubio, Gonzalo Jara

Midfielders: Gonzalo Freitas, Fernando Beltran

Attackers: Eduard Bello, Brayan Rubio, Ariel Nahuelpan

Striker: Nicolas Benedetti

Match Preview

The League Cup brings together two clubs from different leagues, as DC United of MLS hosts Mazatlan FC of Liga MX. This match promises to be a battle of different styles and tactics, but both teams have the same goal.

The battle in midfield will be very important. DC United will try to control the ball and create opportunities, while MazatlAn will try to disrupt their rhythm of play and counterattack effectively.

DC United with their home advantage and positive form of late, are slight favourites. However, Mazatlan has shown the ability to compete and could make it a challenging match.

Score Prediction

If you look at the H2H and the squad that will be fielded in the match as well as the performance of the two teams this season in the League Cup, it seems that the match will end with a score of 2-0 in favor of DC United.

League Cup Schedule, Live Broadcast and Streaming Link DC United vs Mazatlan

Match: DC United vs Mazatlan

Competition: League Cup

Date: Saturday, August 10, 2024

Time: 06:30 WIB

Venue: Audi Field Stadium
